ing: 1 (12 ounce) can tomato-vegetable juice cocktail (such as V8Â®)
1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHotÂ®)
1 teaspoon prepared horseradish, or to taste
des: "This versatile spicy tomato cooler is a tasty way to start the day. Add some vodka and you'll have a great beverage for brunch or an evening cocktail. Adjust the hot sauce and horseradish to your desired level of spiciness."
ins:
Stir tomato-vegetable juice cocktail, beef broth, steak sauce, lime juice, hot pepper sauce, horseradish, and celery salt together in a pitcher.
Fill 2 cocktail glasses with crushed ice. Pour cooler over ice; garnish with celery stalks and lime slices.
